data.actual_result: When the pop up appears not even the header bar is fully visible (app probably takes the portrait mode offset into consideration)
data.expected_result: The pop up appears and with its appearance some options for the message  are shown
data.short_description: Long pressing on a message while in landscape mode will cause the pop up to appear lower in the screen than expected
data.steps_to_repro: - Change to landscape mode - Long press on a message - Wait for the pop up to appear
